definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">player_log_in</field><next><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"/><value name="IF0"><block type="entity_has_achievement"><field name="achievement">CUSTOM:WTNN</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_clearpotions"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></statement><statement name="ELSE"><block type="entity_add_achievement"><field name="achievement">CUSTOM:WTNN</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="world_data_isremote"/></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="world_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Hello and Thank You for download Negative-N 1.2</field></block></value><next><block type="world_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">If you want to see the Wiki: https://negativenmod.blogspot.com/p/welcome-to-negative-n-wiki.html</field></block></value></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
